name: DISCOmfort (Ionatan B Maghidman)
description:
A submission for an assignment in RMIT University. The goal I set out to myself was to create an environment that evokes deep discomfort from me, and I chose a nightclub for that.

The point of the experience is to feel discomfort, and I urge you to battle through the urge of quitting.

IT IS WORTH NOTING: I do NOT recommend this game if you have any form of sensitivity towards loud noises and flashing lights.

I would like to acknowledge that the music was created by friend Joshua Hickman, whose social media is @joshhickmanmusic

The character controller was downloaded from the Unity Asset Store, the original creator is Jess Case
